item.title: 富士康第二季度收入同比增长 19%，第三季度有望实现增长
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司最大的 iPhone 组装商--台湾富士康周五公布，其第二季度营收同比增长 19%，并预计第三季度营收将同比增长。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn, the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, reported on Friday its second-quarter revenue jumped 19% year-on-year, and predicted third-quarter revenue would rise year-on-year.】

item.title: 丰田在认证调查中未发现新的不当行为
item.description: 日本汽车制造商丰田汽车周五在一份声明中说，除了上个月已经报告的案例外，丰田汽车在其车型的认证申请中没有发现任何新的不当行为。【原文：Toyota Motor did not find any new cases of wrongdoing in the certification applications of its car models beyond the ones it had already reported last month, the Japanese automaker said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 中国央行可动用数千亿元人民币债券为多头反弹降温
item.description: 中国央行周五告诉路透社记者，中国央行有价值数千亿元人民币的债券可供借贷，并将根据市场情况出售这些债券。【原文：China's central bank has hundreds of billions of yuan worth of bonds at its disposal to borrow, and will sell them depending on market conditions, the bank told Reuters on Friday, part of a plan markets see as an effort to cool a powerful bond rally.】

item.title: 壳牌将对新加坡和鹿特丹工厂进行高达 20 亿美元的减记
item.description: 壳牌周五表示，在出售新加坡炼油厂和暂停欧洲最大生物燃料厂之一的建设后，壳牌将计提高达 20 亿美元的减值费用。【原文：Shell will take an impairment charge of up to $2 billion after the sale of its Singapore refinery and pausing of construction of one of Europe's largest biofuel plants, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 英美资源集团延长受火灾影响的澳大利亚矿山工人的薪资
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业与能源工会（Mining And Energy Union）与英美资源集团（Anglo American）达成协议，将本周早些时候因地下火灾而关闭的格罗夫纳煤矿工人的工资延长至8月底。【原文：Australia's Mining And Energy Union has reached an agreement with Anglo American to extend pay until August-end for workers at its Grosvenor mine that was shut earlier this week due to an ongoing underground fire, the two parties said.】

item.title: 阿托斯称通过银团协议获得短期融资
item.description: 法国技术公司阿托斯（Atos）周五表示，该公司已通过债权人提供的两批贷款成功获得了短期融资，并表示仍有望在本月达成最终重组协议。【原文：French technology company Atos said on Friday it had successfully secured short-term financing via two tranches of loans from creditors, adding it still expected to reach a final restructuring agreement this month.】

item.title: 中国正努力利用储能技术的蓬勃发展，呼吁更多储能技术的应用。
item.description: 在中国山东省的一片荒芜的泥地上，一排排看似薄薄的白色集装箱一字排开。【原文：Rows of what look like thin, white shipping containers are lined up on a barren dirt field in China's Shandong province.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车电池制造商在储能领域的实力如何？
item.description: 中国的电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 300750.SZ 和比亚迪 002594.SZ 正紧盯日益增长的固定储能市场。【原文：China's EV battery giants CATL 300750.SZ and BYD 002594.SZ are eyeing the growing market for stationary energy storage.】

item.title: 早间竞标斯塔默的稳定开局
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 美国 6 月就业和工资增长预计放缓
item.description: 6 月份，美国的就业增长可能放缓至一个仍然健康的速度，失业率稳定在 4%，这增加了美联储在不使经济陷入衰退的情况下抑制通货膨胀的可能性。【原文：U.S. job growth likely slowed to a still-healthy pace in June, with the unemployment rate holding steady at 4%, increasing the chances that the Federal Reserve will be able to tame inflation without tipping the economy into recession.】

item.title: 香港零售商寄希望于免税配额的增加来促进销售
item.description: 中国游客赴港免税配额的增加可能会在一定程度上支持香港的零售商，但来自内地的游客表示，香港的物价仍然缺乏吸引力。【原文：An increase in the duty-free quota for Chinese tourists to Hong Kong may go some way to support the city's retailers, but visitors from the mainland say prices are still unattractive.】

item.title: 比特币跌至四个月低点，以太坊下挫 8
item.description: 受乔-拜登（Joe Biden）是否仍将是民主党美国总统候选人的不确定性以及对加密货币供应可能增加的担忧的影响，比特币周五跌至四个月低点，并有望创下一年来最差的单周表现。【原文：Bitcoin sank to a four-month low on Friday and was on course for its worst weekly performance in a year, hurt by uncertainty over whether Joe Biden will remain the Democrats' U.S. presidential candidate and by worries about potential increases in crypto supply.】

item.title: 加拿大为批准关键矿产领域的大型并购交易设定高标准
item.description: 加拿大周四向采矿业发出通知，任何针对该国重要矿产生产商的重大交易只有在 "最特殊的情况下 "才能获得批准。【原文：Canada on Thursday put the mining industry on notice that any major deals targeting the country's producers of critical minerals would only be approved under "the most exceptional circumstances".】

item.title: 澳大利亚法院裁定 PayPal 部门在小型企业合同中使用不公平用语
item.description: 澳大利亚证券监管机构周五表示，澳大利亚联邦法院认定，PayPal 的本地分支在与小型企业客户签订的标准合同中使用了一个不公平的条款，可能会忽略多收费的错误。【原文：Australia's federal court has found that PayPal's local arm used an unfair term in its standard contracts with small business customers that could overlook errors in overcharging, the country's securities regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 油价有望连续四周上涨
item.description: 周五亚市盘中，油价变化不大，但有望连续第四周上涨，并保持在4月底以来的最高水平附近，原因是夏季燃料需求有望强劲，且存在一些供应担忧。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in Asian trade on Friday but were on track for a fourth straight week of gains and holding near their highest levels since late April on hopes of strong summer fuel demand and some supply concerns.】

item.title: 中国敦促欧盟在电动汽车关税生效之际认真对待谈判
item.description: 中国国家支持的《环球时报》敦促欧盟在对中国制造的电动汽车（EV）征收关税之前，在技术谈判中 "拿出诚意"，此前欧盟称临时关税将于周五生效。【原文：China's state-backed Global Times has urged the EU to "show sincerity" in technical talks before imposing tariffs on Chinese-manufactured electric vehicles (EVs), after the bloc said provisional tariffs would take effect from Friday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市屡创新高；工党大获全胜后英镑保持平静
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市再创新高，因为投资者对美国 9 月份的降息进行了评估，市场情绪乐观，而欧元则在法国大选前创下了三周来的最高点。【原文：Asian share markets scaled new highs on Friday as investors sized up U.S. rate cuts for September and the mood was upbeat, while the euro hit a three-week peak ahead of French elections.】

item.title: 美元创三周新低；英镑对英国大选泰然处之
item.description: 周五，美元在三周低点附近徘徊，而英镑坚挺，因为工党有望在英国大选中赢得绝大多数席位。【原文：The U.S. dollar was hovering near three-week lows on Friday ahead of payrolls data that will likely influence the outlook for rates, while the pound was firm as the Labour party looked set to win a massive majority in the UK general election.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，OpenAI 的内部人工智能细节在 2023 年的漏洞事件中被盗
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周四报道，一名黑客去年进入了 OpenAI 的内部邮件系统，并窃取了该公司人工智能技术的设计细节。【原文：A hacker gained access to the internal messaging systems at OpenAI last year and stole details about the design of the company's artificial intelligence technologies, the New York Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 芯片价格飙升，三星第二季度利润增幅好于预期
item.description: 三星电子周五预计其第二季度营业利润将增长 15 倍以上，原因是人工智能热潮推动半导体价格反弹，使其盈利从一年前的低点回升。【原文：Samsung Electronics estimated on Friday a more than 15-fold rise in its second-quarter operating profit, as rebounding semiconductor prices driven by the artificial intelligence boom lifted earnings from a low base a year ago.】

item.title: 日本 5 月家庭支出下降 1.8%，低于预期
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，5月份日本家庭支出意外下降，原因是物价上涨继续挤压消费者的购买力，进一步威胁脆弱的经济。【原文：Japanese household spending unexpectedly fell in May, government data showed on Friday, as higher prices continued to squeeze consumers' purchasing power, further threatening the fragile economy.】

item.title: 加拿大有条件批准嘉能可收购泰克煤炭部门
item.description: 加拿大工业部长周四表示，加拿大政府已批准嘉能可公司（Glencore）斥资 69.3 亿美元收购矿业公司泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）的炼钢煤部门，但有严格的保留工作岗位的条件。【原文：The Canadian government has approved Glencore's $6.93 billion acquisition of miner Teck Resources' steelmaking coal unit with strict conditions to preserve jobs, the country's industry minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 萨克斯店主以 26.5 亿美元收购奢侈品零售商尼曼-马库斯 (Neiman Marcus)
item.description: 萨克斯第五大道（Saks Fifth Avenue）的母公司周四表示，已同意以 26.5 亿美元的价格收购竞争对手奢侈品零售商尼曼-马库斯（Neiman Marcus）。【原文：The parent of Saks Fifth Avenue said on Thursday it has agreed to buy rival luxury retailer Neiman Marcus in a $2.65 billion deal.】

item.title: 埃德蒙德-罗斯柴尔德集团投资老板：特朗普当选总统将导致美国债券收益率飙升
item.description: 埃德蒙德-罗斯柴尔德资产管理公司（Edmond de Rothschild Asset Management）首席投资官本杰明-梅尔曼（Benjamin Melman）周四表示，如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在11月份的美国总统大选中获胜，将预示着美国长期国债收益率将飙升。【原文：A win for Donald Trump in the U.S. presidential election in November would herald a spike in long-term U.S. Treasury yields, said Edmond de Rothschild Asset Management's Chief Investment Officer Benjamin Melman on Thursday.】

item.title: 华为高管驳斥先进芯片短缺将阻碍中国人工智能雄心的观点
item.description: 中国科技巨头华为（HWT.UL）的一位高管周四驳斥了最先进人工智能芯片短缺将阻碍华为成为人工智能领导者的观点，但表示需要创新来解决这一问题。【原文：A senior executive at Chinese technology giant Huawei (HWT.UL) on Thursday dismissed the idea that a shortage of the most advanced artificial intelligence chips will hinder the country's aim to be a leader in AI, but said innovation is needed to address the issue.】

item.title: 日本股市创两个半月来最大单周外资流入量
item.description: 在日元走软、全球热捧人工智能相关公司的背景下，上周外资买入提振了日本股市，从而缓和了对日本央行政策前景的担忧。【原文：Foreign purchases boosted Japanese stocks last week amid a weakening yen and global enthusiasm for artificial intelligence-linked companies, which tempered concerns about the Bank of Japan's policy outlook.】

item.title: 比特币因大选不确定性和 Mt Gox 资金流而创下两个月新低
item.description: 比特币周四跌至两个月低点，延续了一个月来的跌势，原因是美国总统选举的不确定性以及一家已停业的东京加密货币交易所有关比特币供应的报道。【原文：Bitcoin slid to a two-month low on Thursday, extending a month-long fall, as uncertainty over U.S. presidential elections and reports of bitcoin supply from a defunct Tokyo-based crypto exchange weighed.】

item.title: 欧盟对中国产电动汽车征收关税，为谈判留出四个月时间
item.description: 欧盟官员周四表示，欧盟将从周五起对进口中国制造的电动汽车征收高达 37.6% 的关税，从而加剧与中国政府的贸易紧张关系。【原文：The European Union will impose tariffs of up to 37.6% from Friday on imports of electric vehicles made in China, EU officials said on Thursday, ratcheting up trade tension with Beijing.】

item.title: 中国与欧盟就即将实施的电动汽车关税举行技术性会谈
item.description: 中国商务部在例行新闻发布会上表示，中欧双方就中国电动汽车关税问题举行了多轮技术性会谈，欧盟委员会将于周四确认对中国电动汽车征收关税。【原文：China and Europe held several rounds of technical talks over tariffs on Chinese electric cars that the European Commission is set to confirm on Thursday, China's commerce ministry said at a regular news conference.】

item.title: 受美国利率前景和科技股反弹影响，亚洲股市吸引大量外资流入
item.description: 由于美国物价压力的缓解提升了人们对美联储今年降息的希望，外国投资者在经历了两个月的抛售之后，于 6 月份将大量资金引入亚洲股市。【原文：Foreign investors channelled massive money into Asian equities in June, after two months of selling, as easing U.S. price pressures raised hopes that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates this year.】
